I use #Cannabis extract in a Capsule for #Cancer since 2014 ~ 
I am not "cured" if I run out of the extract my lesions return w/in 7 days ~ I learned from a Breast Cancer survivor @SharonLetts ~ 
I support eating Cannabis for using Nutrition & smoking
